Louisville_Jefferson_County.Louisville, Kentucky: Louisville ( ( listen) LOO-ə-vəl,  ( listen) LUUV-əl or  ( listen)) is the largest city in the Commonwealth of Kentucky and the 29th-most populous city in the United States. It is one of two cities in Kentucky designated as first-class, the other being the state's second-largest city of Lexington. Louisville is the historical seat and, since 2003, the nominal seat of Jefferson County.
